parameters.name: ApiId
parameters.description: The ID of the API. This ID is generated by the system and globally unique.

parameters.name: AppIds
parameters.description: The IDs of applications. Separate multiple application IDs with commas (,). A maximum of 100 applications IDs can be entered.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group. This ID is generated by the system and globally unique.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The name of the runtime environment. Valid values:

*   **RELEASE**
*   **TEST**
